donation_pitch: Please consider donating, it'll fund future CopaFests and other club activities to keep the hobby of ham radio alive.
notifications:
We are pleased to announce that CopaFest 2021 is a GO!!!
Those that pre-purchased raffle tickets for CopaFest 2020 your tickets are still valid for CopaFest 2021.
Online purchase for CopaFest 2021 raffle tickets are available now!
